lyric:
[by:咆哮吧]
[00:45.69]Take heed, dear heart
[00:48.62]Once apart, she can touch nor me nor you
[00:55.14]Dressed as one
[00:58.43]A wolf will betray a lamb
[01:04.65]Lead astray the gazers
[01:07.73]The razors on your seducing skin
[01:13.95]In the meadow of sinful thoughts
[01:17.24]Every flower's perfect
[01:23.84]To paradise with pleasure haunted by fear
[01:36.42]A sin for him
[01:37.99]Desire within Desire within
[01:42.79]A burning veil
[01:45.07]For the bride too dear for him
[01:48.85]A sin for him
[01:50.46]Desire within Desire within
[01:55.44]Fall in love with your deep dark sin
[02:13.55]I am the Fallen
[02:16.74]You are what my sins enclose
[02:23.00]Lust is not as creative
[02:26.19]As its discovery
[02:32.61]To paradise with pleasure haunted by fear
[02:45.25]A sin for him
[02:48.38]Desire within Desire within
[02:51.57]A burning veil
[02:54.04]For the bride too dear for him
[02:57.74]A sin for him
[02:59.80]Desire within Desire within
[03:03.90]Fall in love with your deep dark sin
[03:47.86]Bless me, undress me
[03:50.94]Pick your prey in a wicked way
[03:53.99]God I must confess I do envy the sinners
[04:03.95]A sin for him
[04:06.38]Desire within
[04:10.01]A burning veil
[04:12.35]For the bride too dear for him
[04:16.29]A sin for him
[04:17.80]Desire within Desire within
[04:22.30]A burning veil
[04:24.73]For the bride too dear for him
[04:28.72]A sin for him
[04:30.39]Desire within Desire within
[04:35.24]Fall in love with your deep dark sin
tlyric:
[by:咆哮吧]
[00:45.69]小心留意 亲爱的
[00:48.62]一旦分离 她便与你我无关
[00:55.14]虽然披着羊皮
[00:58.43]恶狼终将背叛羊羔
[01:04.65]所有见到你的人都被迷惑
[01:07.73]你诱人的肌肤如锋利的剃刀
[01:13.95]在滋生罪恶思想的草地
[01:17.24]每朵鲜花都是个完美的
[01:23.84]那快乐的天堂已被被恐惧缠绕
[01:36.42]他犯下的罪
[01:37.99]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[01:42.79]深爱他的新娘
[01:45.07]为他燃烧着面纱
[01:48.85]他犯下的罪
[01:50.46]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[01:55.44]带着你那深重的原罪坠入爱河
[02:13.55]我已堕落
[02:16.74]你是我的罪恶之源
[02:23.00]欲望藏于深处
[02:26.19]等待爆发
[02:32.61]那快乐的天堂已被被恐惧缠绕
[02:45.25]他犯下的罪
[02:48.38]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[02:51.57]深爱他的新娘
[02:54.04]为他燃烧着面纱
[02:57.74]他犯下的罪
[02:59.80]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[03:03.90]带着你那深重的原罪坠入爱河
[03:47.86]请保佑我 让我解脱
[03:50.94]用那邪恶的方式选择出的祭品
[03:53.99]神啊我必须忏悔 我如此嫉妒那些罪人
[04:03.95]他犯下的罪
[04:06.38]饱含欲望
[04:10.01]深爱他的新娘
[04:12.35]为他燃烧着面纱
[04:16.29]他犯下的罪
[04:17.80]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[04:22.30]深爱他的新娘
[04:24.73]为他燃烧着面纱
[04:28.72]他犯下的罪
[04:30.39]充斥欲望 饱含邪念
[04:35.24]带着你那深重的原罪坠入爱河
